text: Sandra Klösel (born 22 June 1979) is a former tennis player from Germany. Kösel turned professional in July 1995, and won nine singles and six doubles titles on the ITF Women's Circuit. In March 2007, she reached a career-high singles ranking of world No. 87. On 1 October 2007, she peaked at No. 128 in the doubles rankings. ==ITF circuit finals== ===Singles: 20 (8–12)=== {| class=wikitable style="font-size:85%" !
